title: AXA A1 OCR Extraction Schema (Insured Left)
description: This form for LEFT = insured, Extract values ONLY from the LEFT side. Do not mix sides.

insured.description: LEFT column 建議被保人 (Insured). Extract ONLY from the insured (left) side.

name.description: Item 1 (LEFT) 姓名. FIRST copy the text exactly as seen in the name box into raw_full_name_text. THEN split ONLY from that text. NEVER invent missing English words or Chinese characters.

raw_full_name_lines.description: Copy each visible line in reading order. Do not merge or transliterate.

anyOf.description: COPY EXACTLY what is visible in the name box area (English/Chinese/parentheses). If only 'LI' is visible, output 'LI'. If only '李' is visible, output '李'. If nothing visible, null.

english_surname.description: Derive ONLY from raw_full_name_text. If there are English letters, set this to the FIRST English token that is actually visible (e.g., 'LI'). If no English letters, null. DO NOT guess missing surname.

english_given_name.description: Derive ONLY from raw_full_name_text. Use remaining English tokens AFTER english_surname. If no additional English tokens are clearly visible, MUST be null. DO NOT infer/expand given name.

chinese_name.description: Derive ONLY from raw_full_name_text. Keep ONLY the Chinese characters that are actually visible. If only one character (e.g., '李') is visible, output only that. MUST NOT add extra characters.

gender.description: Item 2 (LEFT): Gender checkbox. Output '男性' or '女性' only if clearly checked; otherwise ''.

男性.description: true if '男性' checkbox is clearly checked; false otherwise.

女性.description: true if '女性' checkbox is clearly checked; false otherwise.

date_of_birth_ymd.description: Item 3 (LEFT / Insured 建議被保人): Date of birth as ONE string in format 'YYYY-MM-DD'. Read ONLY the LEFT column 年 / 月 / 日 boxes. RULES: (1) Extract digits only, then format as YYYY-MM-DD (month/day must be 2 digits, pad with leading zero if needed). (2) If ANY of the three boxes is blank or has no visible digits, output null. (3) NEVER reuse values from the RIGHT column. (4) NEVER output placeholders such as 'N/A', 'NA', '-', or 'unknown'.

date_of_birth.description: Item 3 (LEFT / Insured 建議被保人): Date of birth. Read ONLY the three boxes 年 / 月 / 日 on the LEFT column. DO NOT read or reuse anything from the RIGHT column. DIGITS RULE: extract digits only (0–9). NULL RULE: output null ONLY if the box is truly empty (no ink) OR the digit is completely not present. If there is visible ink/digits in the box, you MUST output the best matching digit(s) (do not output null due to low confidence). You MUST zoom/mentally focus on each of the 3 boxes one-by-one before deciding null. FORBIDDEN: 'N/A', 'NA', '-', 'unknown' or any placeholder text.

year.description: Item 3 (LEFT / Insured) 年: exactly 4 digits (YYYY) if visible, else null.

month.description: Item 3 (LEFT / Insured) 月: 1–12 (digits only) if visible, else null.

day.description: Item 3 (LEFT / Insured) 日: 1–31 (digits only) if visible, else null.

place_of_birth.description: Item 4 (LEFT): 出生地 / Place of birth. STRICT OCR ONLY. Do not infer.

country.description: Item 4 (LEFT) 出生地-國家. STRICT: Copy ONLY the characters written/printed inside the '國家' box for Item 4 (LEFT). Do NOT guess. Do NOT infer from city/town. If the box is empty, crossed out, or not clearly readable, return null.

city_or_town.description: Item 4 (LEFT) 出生地-城市/城鎮. STRICT: Copy ONLY the characters written/printed inside the '城市/城鎮' box for Item 4 (LEFT). Do NOT guess. Do NOT expand abbreviations. If the box is empty, crossed out, or not clearly readable, return null.

raw_item5_nationality_row_text.description: RAW Item 5 國籍 row ONLY. Copy EXACT handwriting found on the row labeled '國籍' (above Item 6). If blank/unreadable, null. NEVER copy '非香港永久居民'.

nationality.description: FINAL Item 5 國籍. MUST be copied from raw_item5_nationality_row_text. If raw is null, output null.

identity.description: Item 6 (LEFT) 身份證明. Extract ONLY what is visible. Do not infer. Do not duplicate values across fields.

is_hk_permanent_resident.description: Item 6 (LEFT): Checkbox square immediately BEFORE the printed text '香港永久居民'. Set true ONLY if there is a visible tick/mark INSIDE THAT square. If the tick is on the other line, this MUST be false.

is_non_hk_permanent_resident.description: Item 6 (LEFT): Checkbox square immediately BEFORE the printed text '非香港永久居民'. Set true ONLY if there is a visible tick/mark INSIDE THAT square. If the tick is on the other line, this MUST be false.

raw_line_3_id_text.description: RAW line ③: Copy ONLY the handwritten/typed ID NUMBER itself (digits only). Do NOT copy printed labels such as '非香港永久居民...' If no digits visible, null.

raw_line_4_passport_text.description: RAW line ④: Copy ONLY the handwritten/typed PASSPORT/BIRTH CERTIFICATE NUMBER itself (letters/digits). Do NOT copy printed labels. If blank, null.

hk_id_card_no_or_birth_certificate_no.description: Fill ONLY if '香港永久居民' checkbox is checked. Otherwise MUST be null.

non_hk_permanent_id.description: NON-HK MODE ONLY. Must be EXACTLY the same as raw_line_3_id_text (line ③ digits).

passport_no_or_birth_certificate_no.description: NON-HK MODE ONLY. Must be EXACTLY the same as raw_line_4_passport_text (line ④). Example: C59277.

relation_with_proposed_insured.description: Item 7 (LEFT) RAW. MUST copy EXACTLY the visible text on the SAME LEFT row as label '與擬保人之關係' (printed or handwritten). Example: if you see '子女用', output '子女用'. If truly nothing visible, null.

employee_name.description: Item 8 (LEFT / Insured 建議被保人): Employer / company name (僱主名稱). Extract handwriting written on the SAME ROW as label '8. 僱主名稱', under the LEFT column. The handwriting may be written across the row and NOT inside a box. If handwriting is present on Item 8 LEFT row, you MUST extract it. Do NOT confuse with Item 9 (聯絡地址). If Item 8 LEFT row is blank, output null.

office_location.description: Item 9 (LEFT): Office address. Extract ONLY handwritten/typed user-entered content. Printed placeholders/labels (e.g., 大廈或屋邨名稱, 街道名稱及號碼) MUST be ignored. If no handwriting is present, all fields must be null.

building_or_estate_name.description: In combined_block mode: put the FULL handwritten address block here ONLY if there is actual handwriting. MUST NOT copy placeholders/labels.

nature_of_employee_business.description: Item 10 (LEFT): Nature of employer business (業務性質/工作性質). Copy exactly.

title.description: Item 11 (LEFT): Job title (職銜/職業). Copy exactly.

duties.description: Item 11 (LEFT): Job duties (職責). Copy exactly.

education.description: Item 12 (LEFT): Education checkbox. Output '小學或以下' or '中學/預科' or '大專或以上' only if clearly checked; otherwise ''.

小學或以下.description: true if '小學或以下' checkbox is clearly checked; false otherwise.

中學/預科.description: true if '中學/預科' checkbox is clearly checked; false otherwise.

大專或以上.description: true if '大專或以上' checkbox is clearly checked; false otherwise.
